Description: Rim sherd of large Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed (fired reddish) below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centre; exterior: dot and billet pattern around rim above key maeander band running left; surface worn below.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0459) (phase 2)
